Hello everyone, Scratch Cat here!
Welcome to Episode 2 of Scratch TV News!
Let's start off by talking about an upcoming Scratch event.
So there's an event that the Scratch Team does almost every year for educators and other people.
It's called the Scratch Conference.
This year's theme is Imagination in Action.
The conference will take place on July 24 online.
Spaces are limited, so if you know of someone older who is interested, tell them to join today!
Next, let's talk about the future of the Scratch TV Animation Contest.
So I made a contest about 3 months ago to celebrate getting 500 followers.
And we got over 900 entries.
However, I haven't been having the motivation to look at entries lately.
And I'm also busy with other things.
So, I don't really know when the results will be out, but hopefully by the end of 2025 they will be out.
Okay, so now, it's shoutout time!
The shoutout of the day goes to...
abdurrah man hat!
Check out their projects!
Well, that's all for this episode of Scratch TV News!
See you next time!
Bye!
